content: > **let s stay in touch ** > >want more designs like this i have a newsletter where i share details about upcoming pattern releases online classes and knit-alongs and all sorts of body positive knitting/sewing content > > subscribe to my newsletter 1 | follow me on instagram @jacquelinecieslak 2 this little washcloth was originally designed as a scrap-buster for any leftover yarn from the sol tank pattern 3 it s a sweet simple speedy knit that makes a great gift especially with a jar of homemade sugar scrub <big><big><big>the headwrap hack</big></big></big> free instructions for hacking this pattern to make a headwrap pictured here in quince & co sparrow in the color penny are available on my blog here 4 1 https //www jacquelinecieslak com/newsletter 2 https //www instagram com/jacquelinecieslak/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sol-8 4 https //jacquelinecieslak com/blog/sol-on-the-bias-headwrap-hack
